a.style: font-family:'Playfair Display', Georgia, 'Times New Roman', 'Liberation Serif', serif

text.tspan: World population with and without synthetic nitrogen
Estimates of the global population reliant on synthetic nitrogenous fertilizers, produced via the Haber-Bosch process for food
production. Best estimates project that just over half of the global population could be sustained without reactive nitrogen fertilizer
Data source: Erisman et al. (2008); Smil (2002); Stewart (2005)
